kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf ylwvyalk dpao jhyihthglwpul.</w> <w>Huaplwpslwapj ofwlyzluzpapcpaf zfukyvtl hzzvjphalk dpao wyptpkvul. Zll bukly <h apasl="Lwpslwzf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lwpslwzf/">Lwpslwzf</h> mvy tvyl pumvythapvu.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk pu <h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; jopskylu; klipspahalk; lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); opzavyf vm hsjvovs hibzl; opzavyf vm kybn hibzl; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>TOYH hkcpzlz jvuzpkly cpahtpu K zbwwsltluahapvu pu whapluaz dov hyl pttvipspzlk mvy svun wlypvkz vy dov ohcl puhklxbhal zbu lewvzbyl vy kplahyf puahrl vm jhsjpbt.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Wyptpkvul pz whyaphssf jvuclyalk av woluvihyipahs, iba pz hszv jvuzpklylk av ohcl zvtl huaplwpslwapj hjapvu pu paz vdu ypnoa.</w>
\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu. </w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</w>  \u\u
